title: Avocado Salad
description: A creamy blend of ripe avocado, cherry tomatoes, red onions, and fresh lime juice, offering a rich and refreshing flavor.

title: Cucumber Salad
description: Cool and crisp cucumbers mixed with red onions and a light vinegar dressing, perfect for a refreshing and tangy side.

title: Greek Salad
description: A vibrant mix of tomatoes, cucumbers, red onions, olives, and feta cheese, all tossed in a classic olive oil and herb dressing.
